Hello first fragment Hello second fragment. Arg: %1$s You should have picked Yes No cu Hacking Counter Get counting? Yes Logo of cuHacking> - + Reset Information icon Bold red clickable \'X\' used to exit the dialogue. You also have the option of resetting the counter at the end to track your progress at other hackathons! This is our official counter tool where you can keep track of all the new friends you\'ve made, the awesome workshops you\'ve attended, and even how many new acquaintances you’ve lost after getting incredibly frustrated while trying to complete your project on time!
